price: 30. Or s’ils disent : « C’est un poète. Attendons que la mort vienne l’emporter (lui et son Message). »
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
